chart.title: Share of new electric cars that are fully battery-electric
chart.subtitle: "Electric cars" often refer to both  [fully battery-electric](#dod:battery_electric) cars and [plug-in hybrids](#dod:plugin_hybrid). Shown is the share of new electric cars sold that are fully battery-electric.
chart.citation: International Energy Agency. Global EV Outlook 2025.
